title: E-Learning System Development and Management: Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and foundational science knowledge
context.additional_context: Learners utilize smartphones as primary learning tools and experience collaboration and content management via LMS

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core components and development processes of e-learning systems.
Learners can plan, produce, and distribute educational content using a Learning Management System (LMS).
Learners can design and implement science education projects optimized for mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
